content.title: AAA Screening
content.definition: USPSTF recommends one-time ultrasound screening for men aged 65-75 who have ever smoked.
content.statement: AAA Screening is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aaa that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding AAA Screening helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of AAA Screening include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of AAA Screening.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
